name: Beat Monsters
detailed_description:
Beat Monsters is a virtual reality rogue-lite rhythm game that will take you through dungeons filled with monsters moving to the groove and chomping at the bit to stop you from reaching the darkest depths and the glorious treasures waiting therein. Hack and slash your way through procedurally generated levels to the sounds of your favorite tunes and experience community-made beatmaps in a whole new way.

Features

  • Dance of Death - Monsters attack in time to songs, so to will you move to dodge, parry and land blows of your own.
  • Soundscapes - The environment itself is created and affected by the music. Torches flare, potions glow, and monsters manifest to the beat.
  • Crafted by the Community - Hundreds of existing beatmaps can be experienced like never before. Custom songs can be imported to fill out your "slaylist" and provide the perfect soundtrack for your quest.
